title: Glottography dataset derived from Queixalos and Renault-Lescure 2000 "As línguas amazônicas hoje"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping, contemporary language ranges for the Northern part of South America derived from the maps in Queixalos and Renault-Lescure 2009.
citation: Queixalos, Francisco & Odile Renault-Lescure. 2000. As línguas amazônicas hoje. In  Queixalós, Francisco and Renault-Lescure, Odile (eds.) São Paulo: IRD/Instituto Socioambiental/MPEG. 432pp.
